name: Into The Cave (TheMosterts)
description:
You are stuck in a cave infested by hostile robots with a wall of lava closing in from behind, all you can do is go deeper and deeper into the cave!

You have an chance to heal when you shoot the large blue orbs

Controls:

WASD to move.

Shift to sprint.

Spacebar to jump.

LMB to shoot.

RMB to zoom.

Esc to pause.

Please download for best experience!

Made for Ludum Dare 48 by :

The art was done by: Eben Mostert.

The code was written by: Christiaan Mostert.
